reviewText: this is a great series and the seller had it here I think before he got the order and that is fast

LIFE: GREAT ROMANCES (from MADACY) is over 9 hours worth of film clips and never-before-made-public home movies, selected from three private Hollywood collections. Twenty famous couples in all are featured.

CONTENTS--

Volume 1
John Lennon and Yoko Ono
Richard Burton and Elizabeth Taylor
Paul Newman and Joanne Woodward
Robert Wagner and Natalie Wood
Jackie Kennedy and JFK

Volume 2
Clark Gable and Carole Lombard
Douglas Fairbanks and Mary Pickford
Humphrey Bogart and Lauren Bacall
Greta Garbo and John Gilbert
Grace Kelly and Prince Rainier

Volume 3
Cary Grant and Barbara Hutton
Howard Hughes and Ava Gardner
Ernest Hemingway and Martha Gellhorn
Amelia Earhart and George Putnam
Eva and Juan Peron

Volume 4
Marilyn Monroe and Joe DiMaggio
Tony Curtis and Janet Leigh
Laurence Olivier and Vivien Leigh
Ingrid Bergman and Roberto Rossellini
Aristotle Onassis and Maria Callas
